_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:46:53 using v2.1
title: What are patients' overall experiences of out-of hours GP services?
analysis_commentary: The majority of patients are also happy with their overall experiences of out-of-hours GP services, but to a lesser extent than their overall experience of GP surgeries. Of the patients who responded in 2012/2013 70% said their experiences of out-of-hours GP services were very and fairly good and a similar proportion responded in the same way in 2011/2012.Results for late 2013/early 2014 suggest this proportion may be declining.
